Scott Smith

[City Council](https://www.willowparktx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=19)
Title: City Council Member Place 4
[email](https://www.willowparktx.gov/formcenter/Email-Forms-5/Email-Scott-Smith-58)

**Ronald “Scott” Smith – City Council Member, Willow Park, Place 4**

Scott Smith has proudly called Willow Park home for the past 10 years. Deeply committed to the growth and well-being of the community, he has actively served the city in various leadership and advisory roles.

Before being appointed to the City Council, Smith served 8 years on the Planning and Zoning Commission, helping guide responsible development and land use. In addition, he contributed 6 years on the Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone (TIRZ) Board, 6 years on the Capital Improvement Committee, and 6 months on the Board of Adjustments. These roles reflect a strong background in long-term planning, infrastructure, and balanced community development.

Smith brings a collaborative spirit and a passion for civic service to the Council, with a continued focus on ensuring Willow Park remains a vibrant, sustainable, and well-planned city for all residents.
